alert.note: Alert for Cullman (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 2:12AM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Cullman County through 300 AM CDT... At 211 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Curry, or 7 miles southeast of Arley, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cullman, Hanceville, Good Hope, Dodge City, Garden City, Colony, Phelan, Walter, Wilburn and Black Bottom. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
